<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Eidolon's Opportunity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2910) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Eidolon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=386" />
<trait label="Evolution" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=394" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 69 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Trigger**
A creature within your eidolon's reach uses a [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104) action or a [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114) action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

</column>

---

Your eidolon makes a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, your eidolon disrupts that action. This Strike doesn't count toward your multiple attack penalty, and your multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.
name: Eidolon's Opportunity
